fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - "Refine" a player, changing their role. The host must change their status of living from "alive" to "dead" (you fucking kill them).

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If a role can't be refined, you set their defense to None. Also, you kill them.
- You can self target. I'm not sure why you would, but you can.
- Town ("Support") is mechanically just Town (Support) fuck you rasen
